review.author: Frontend-2 (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Opus review: Full integration trace file change → watcher.handleFileChangeCore → customWatches → shared-state.onFileChange → readJsonFile → computeDiffs → broadcast + changelog + IPC. Cross-file contracts verified (addWatch, broadcast signatures). No circular deps. Atomic persistence. 64 tests. Gemini cross-model: Confirmed watcher integration correct, DIFF_FIELDS filters metadata noise, atomic persistence pattern, per-pane lastSeenAt robust, corrupted JSON + window destruction handled. 92 suites / 2921 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
